channel.title: prusa-original on slippytrumpet.io

item.title: 3D Printing. Learnings shared
item.description: Picture. Pump mount. So… I have a Prusa Original Mk2 3D Printer. Learnings specific to this machine, though I expect you could generalise much of this. 1) Prusa Original Mk2 is a great product. Mine was a kit. I built it over 4 evenings, and on the few occasions I’ve contacted support, they’ve been great. 2) You can spend thousands on a 3D printer. Don’t. Prusa is reasonable cost for its ability.
